description.english: Removed the Shadow's residue in the entrance hall in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Den Schattenrückstand in der Eingangshalle in Amnesia: The Dark Descent entfernt.
description.french: Vous avez supprimé le résidu d'ombre du hall d'entrée dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai rimosso ogni residuo dell'Ombra dal salone d'ingresso in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has eliminado los residuos de la Sombra en la entrada en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось убрать остаток Тени в холле Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Remover o resíduo da Sombra no salão de entrada em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中消除“阴影”在门厅的残余。

description.english: Escaped the creature in the water in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Der Kreatur im Gewässer von Amnesia: The Dark Descent entkommen.
description.french: Vous avez échappé à la créature de l'eau dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Sei sfuggito alla creatura nell'acqua in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has escapado de la criatura del agua en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось спастись от существа в водах Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Escapar da criatura na água em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中从水中怪物那逃脱。

description.english: Taken a rough ride on an elevator in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Eine rauhe Fahrt auf einem Aufzug in Amnesia: The Dark Descent unternommen.
description.french: Vous avez fait un passage mouvementé en ascenseur dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai compiuto un viaggio movimentato su uno degli ascensori in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has tenido un mal viaje en ascensor en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось совершить опасное путешествие на лифте в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Descer bruscamente em um elevador em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中搭乘了一趟艰难的升降机之旅。

description.english: Lowered the water level in the cistern to reveal a new way out in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Den Wasserspiegel in der Zisterne herabgesenkt, um einen neuen Ausweg aus Amnesia: The Dark Descent  zu finden.
description.french: Vous avez fait baisser le niveau d'eau de la citerne pour révéler une nouvelle sortie dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai abbassato il livello dell'acqua nella cisterna per svelare una nuova via d'uscita in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has bajado el nivel del agua en la cisterna para desvelar una salida nueva en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось понизить уровень воды в цистерне, чтобы открыть новый выход в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Reduzir o nível de água na cisterna para revelar uma nova saída em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中降低蓄水箱的水位，以展现一条新的出路。

description.english: Collected the pieces of the orb and rebuilt it in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Die Bruchstücke der Kugel in Amnesia: The Dark Descent gefunden und zusammengesetzt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté les pièces du globe pour le reconstruire dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai raccolto i pezzi della sfera e l'hai ricostruita in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todas las piezas del orbe y lo has reconstruido en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось собрать части шара и восстановить его в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Coletar as partes do orbe e reconstruí-lo em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中收集球体碎片并重新装配。

description.english: Killed Alexander and escaped the castle in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Alexander getötet und der Burg in Amnesia: The Dark Descent entkommen.
description.french: Vous avez tué Alexander et vous êtes enfui du château dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai ucciso Alexander e sei fuggito dal castello in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has matado a Alexander y escapado del castillo en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось убить Александра и сбежать из замка в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Matar Alexander e escapar do castelo em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中杀死Alexander，并从城堡逃脱。

description.english: Allowed Alexander to escape in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Alexander erlaubt aus Amnesia: The Dark Descent zu entkommen.
description.french: Vous avez permis à Alexander de s'enfuir dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai lasciato che Alexander fuggisse in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has dejado que Alexander escape en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Позволено сбежать Александру в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Deixar Alexander escapar em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中允许Alexander逃脱。

description.english: Rescued Agrippa in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Agrippa in Amnesia: The Dark Descent befreit.
description.french: Vous avez sauvé Agrippa dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai salvato Agrippa in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a Agrippa en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось спасти Агриппу в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Salvar Agrippa em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中救助了Agrippa。

description.english: Picked up every tinderbox in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Jede Zunderbüchse in Amnesia: The Dark Descent aufgesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté tous les briquets à amadou dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutti gli acciarini in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Has recogido todas las cajas de yesca en Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.russian: Удалось собрать все огнива в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Pegar todos os acendedores em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中捡起了每个火绒箱。

description.english: Left when things were getting interesting in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Amnesia: The Dark Descent verlassen, als es anfing interessant zu werden.
description.french: Vous avez quitté le jeu quand les choses devenaient intéressantes dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Te ne sei andato quando le cose iniziavano a farsi interessanti in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: Te has ido cuando las cosas empezaban a ponerse interesantes en Amnesia: The Dark Descent
description.russian: Игра Amnesia: The Dark Descent покинута на самом интересном месте.
description.brazilian: Sair quando as coisas ficarem interessantes em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中当情况变得有趣时离开。

description.english: Failed to escape the cells and was consumed by the Shadow in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.german: Scheiterte den Zellen zu entkommen und wurde von den Schatten in Amnesia: The Dark Descent verzehrt.
description.french: Vous n'avez pas réussi à vous échapper des cellules et vous êtes fait consumer par l'ombre dans Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.italian: Non sei riuscito a fuggire dalle celle e sei stato consumato dall'Ombra in Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.spanish: No has conseguido escapar de las celdas y te ha atrapado la Sombra en Amnesia: The Dark Descent
description.russian: Не удалось сбежать из тюрьмы, и Тень поглотила героя в Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.brazilian: Falhar ao escapar da cela e ser morto pela Sombra em Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：黑暗后裔》中没能从牢房逃脱，并被“阴影”所吞噬。

description.english: Not a single victim survived in Amnesia: Justine.
description.german: Nicht ein einziges Opfer hat in Amnesia: Justine überlebt.
description.french: Aucune victime n'a survécu dans Amnesia: Justine.
description.italian: Nessuna vittima è sopravvissuta in Amnesia: Justine.
description.spanish: No ha sobrevivido nadie en Amnesia: Justine.
description.russian: Ни одна жертва не выжила в Amnesia: Justine.
description.brazilian: Deixar que todas as vítimas morram em Amnesia: Justine.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：Justine》中没有一个受害者得以幸存。

description.english: Not a single victim died in Amnesia: Justine.
description.german: Nicht ein einziges Opfer ist in Amnesia: Justine gestorben.
description.french: Aucune victime n'est morte dans Amnesia: Justine.
description.italian: Nessuna vittima è morta in Amnesia: Justine.
description.spanish: No ha muerto nadie en Amnesia: Justine.
description.russian: Ни одна жертва не погибла в Amnesia: Justine.
description.brazilian: Não deixar que vítima alguma morra em Amnesia: Justine.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：Justine》中没有一个受害者得以死亡。

description.english: Some victims died, some lived in Amnesia: Justine.
description.german: Einige Opfer überlebten, andere starben in Amnesia: Justine.
description.french: Certaines victimes sont mortes, d'autres ont survécu dans Amnesia: Justine.
description.italian: Alcune vittime sono morte, altre sono sopravvissute in Amnesia: Justine.
description.spanish: Unos han muerto y otros han sobrevivido en Amnesia: Justine.
description.russian: Часть жертв выжила, часть погибла в Amnesia: Justine.
description.brazilian: Deixar que algumas vítimas morram e outras não em Amnesia: Justine.
description.schinese: 在《失忆症：Justine》中得知了A.S.有限公司的跨空间设备的价值。

description.english: Became aware of the merits of A.S. Inc.'s Span-space Device in Amnesia: Justine.
description.german: Kenntnis über die A.S. Inc. Flächen-Öffnungs-Maschine in Amnesia: Justine erhalten.
description.french: Vous avez compris l'intérêt du générateur de portail de A.S. Inc. dans Amnesia: Justine.
description.italian: Ti sei reso conto dell'utilità del dispositivo Tran-spaziale della A. S. Inc. in Amnesia: Justine.
description.spanish: Has descubierto los méritos del Dispositivo Portátil de Portales de A.S. Inc. En Amnesia: Justine.
description.russian: Удалось узнать о достоинствах устройства для искривления пространства корпорации A.S. в Amnesia: Justine.
description.brazilian: Tomar conhecimento dos avanços no Transmutador Espacial da A.S. Inc. em Amnesia: Justine.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏里读过全部的笔记。

description.english: Read all notes in all games.
description.french: Vous avez lu toutes les notes de tous les jeux.
description.italian: Hai letto tutti gli appunti in tutte le partite.
description.spanish: Has leído todas las notas en todos los juegos.
description.russian: Удалось прочесть все записки во всех играх.
description.brazilian: Ler todas as anotações em todos os jogos.
description.schinese: 在所有游戏里读过全部的笔记。

description.french: Vous avez gagné tous les trophées.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli altri trofei.
description.spanish: Consigue el resto de logros del juego

description.english: My name is... Daniel... and I... have made life... exceptionally hard for myself.
description.german: Mein Name ist ... Daniel ... und ich ... haben mir das Leben ... außergewöhnlich schwer gemacht.
description.french: Mon nom est... Daniel... et je... me suis... incroyablement compliqué la vie.
description.italian: Mi chiamo... Daniel... e ho... reso la mia stessa vita... estremamente difficile.
description.spanish: Me llamo... Daniel... y me he... me he complicado... mucho la vida.
description.russian: Меня зовут... Дэниэл... и я... сделал свою жизнь... невыносимой.
description.brazilian: Meu nome é... Daniel... e eu... tornei a vida... estranhamente difícil para mim.
description.schinese: 我的名字是……Daniel……而我……让我自己的人生……异常艰苦。
